As an AI language model, I suggest a few ways you can improve your language and express yourself more clearly:

1. Read more: Reading is the best way to improve your language and vocabulary. Read books or articles related to your field or any topic of your interest, it will help you to learn new words and improve your communication skills.

2. Practice writing: Writing can help you to articulate your thoughts and ideas. Take some time every day to write a few paragraphs or a short article, it can be about anything that interests you.

3. Use appropriate language: Use words and phrases that are appropriate for the situation and the audience. Avoid using jargon or technical words if you are talking to someone who doesn't have the same expertise or background.

4. Speak slowly and clearly: Take your time while speaking, and try to speak clearly and concisely to be better understood. Practice enunciating your words and avoid filler words like, "umm" or "ahh."

5. Get feedback: Seek feedback from your coworkers, clients, or supervisor on your communication skills regularly. It will help you understand where to improve and build more effective communication strategies.

6. Practice active listening: Active listening can help you to understand the other person's perspective and respond accurately to them, which will help you to be more effective in communication.

By actively practicing these tips in your work and personal life, you can improve your language and communication skills, leading to clearer and more effective conversations with your coworkers and clients.
